Text: Anubi e̩wñ-i ge̩ uje̩wñ ucholo amaJuʼka do̩mo̩, oñ Jisus te̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m.
Abukpe omiʼka la de̩ Je̩rusale̩m me̩ru alo̩na amala; ma dʼodu-wñ alu Hibru ko̩ Be̩tsaida; i che̩nʼagbaru me̩lu.
Ef agbaru me̩lu-i ugwe̩ko̩ ame̩ne̩gbo o̩la dachi, tʼamafeju, tʼamade̩re̩, tʼabo kʼo̩la-ma che̩gbe̩. [Ma nede e̩gba kʼomi amiejo:
todu i chenʼe̩gba kʼonuche̩ Ondu agwo̩ru wʼef e̩dagu-omi le̩ kʼi la fʼomi le̩ miejo; todule̩ abu kʼomi le̩ ami, e̩ne̩ ki dʼo̩gba tunyʼu, alu du kʼo̩ga de̩ ki mʼu ne̩, o̩la-wñ adabi tiko.]
E̩ne̩ʼka la do̩mo̩ kʼi dʼef e̩gbo o̩la-wñ o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩jo̩.
E̩gba ku Jisus li-u abu kʼi dachi, kʼi la ma ka kʼi dachi abe̩le̩ kpo̩kpe̩ me̩, i ka ñw u kakini, I dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼo̩la-we̩ ki dabi tiko?
E̩ne̩gbo le̩ dohi ñw u kakini, Odu-mi, u nʼone̩ ki adu mi rikpolo tef abukpe̩ omi-i e̩gba kʼomi-wñ amiejo n; ama e̩gba du kʼu le kʼu wa e̩nomune̩ agwo̩ru o̩gba mi.
Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Kwane̩, mʼakpata-we̩ du kʼe̩ lule̩.
Tak ababale̩ o̩la e̩ne̩ le̩ mudabi tiko, i la mʼakpata-wñ du i kwane̩ alule̩. O̩jo̩ le̩ la chʼo̩jo̩ uñmi.
Todule̩ amaju ka ñw e̩ne̩ ku ma che o̩ga-wñ kpa le̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ uñmi de̩, o̩da je̩ ñw e̩ dʼakpata-we̩ n.
Ama i dohi ñwu ma kakini, E̩ne̩ ki je̩ ñw o̩la-mi dabi tiko, e̩ne̩ le̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, Mʼakpata-we̩ du kʼe̩ lule̩.
Ma tʼowñ ene kakini, E̩ne̩ ka ñw e̩, Mʼu du, kʼe̩ lule̩?
E̩ne̩ ku ma che o̩ga-wñ kpa le̩ la ma e̩ne̩ ki che n; todu Jisus muji kwʼo̩mo̩ abu kʼo̩wo̩-amone̩ jʼugbo le̩.
Anubi e-le̩ Jisus fʼu li ef unyi O̩jo̩, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Go, e̩ mudabi tiko me̩; e̩ ki ño̩ dure ge̩ n, tode̩gba kʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ tule ake̩re̩bʼe̩.
E̩ne̩ le̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ le; oñ i ka ñw amaJu kaku Jisus chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi je̩ ñw o̩la-wñ dabi tiko.
Tod ekide̩ ge̩ oñ amaJu kwodoli Jisus, todabu kʼi fʼe̩wñ-i che o̩jo̩ uñmi.
Ama Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ata-mi te̩tachuko̩lo̩ gbogbo wʼe̩gba-i, omi la achuko̩lo̩ ge̩.
Todu ekide̩ amaJu ño̩ feju tule ku ma fʼu kpa, i chutodabu kʼi atu o̩jo̩ uñmi kate n, i muda ño̩ ka kʼO̩jo̩ chʼAta e-wñ ge̩; kʼi dʼo̩la-wñ chʼokujo̩ kpai O̩jo̩.

Todule̩ Jisus dohi ñwu ma kakini, Ami, ami naka ñwu me̩ kakini, O̩ma neke chʼe̩wñ du kpai ojika o̩la-wñ n, chai e̩wñ kʼi li kʼAta ache; todu e̩wñ du kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ache, e̩wñ le̩ oñ O̩ma ñʼache abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Todu Ata ache̩do̩ O̩ma; i adʼe̩wñ du kʼi ache ñʼo̩; i adʼuko̩lo̩ ki tʼe-i le i ñʼo̩ ge̩, todu kʼame̩ ki yaye.
Todu alu kʼAta akʼabo ki ku dajikwane̩, kʼi año̩ du iñmi ñwu ma, abe̩le̩ O̩ma adʼiñmi ñw e̩ne̩ ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ ge̩.
Todu Ata akajo̩ e̩ne̩ du n, i la mʼajo̩ eka chaka ko ñw O̩ma me̩;
todu kʼe̩ne̩ du ki bumʼO̩ma alu ku ma bumʼAta. E̩ne̩ ki ma bumʼO̩ma n abumʼAta e-ki kpʼo̩ wa n.
Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ ki agbʼo̩la-mi kʼi laño̩ ke̩do̩nola e̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa fʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ ne̩ me̩, i ñʼawʼef ajo̩ ge̩ n, i muda kwʼef uku lale tef iñmi me̩.
Ami, ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Adiko auwa-wñ awa, owñ le̩ la chʼifa-i, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼabo ki ku agbo̩ omuko̩la O̩ma O̩jo̩; abo ku ma la gbo̩ adeju.
Todu alu kʼAta chenʼiñmi ef o̩to̩to̩la-wñ, abe̩le̩ i ño̩ du ñw O̩ma kʼi nʼiñmi ef o̩to̩to̩la-wñ ge̩;
i laño̩ mʼo̩da ajo̩ du ñw u kʼi kada, todabu kʼi chʼO̩ma One̩.
Me̩ ki yaye e̩wñ-i n; todu adiko awa e̩gba kʼabo du ku ma jʼef oji agbo̩ omuko̩la-wñ,
ma ñʼadufu wa; abo ku ma te̩tachʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ atef udajikwane̩ e-iñmi, abo ku ma te̩tache e̩wñ ibe̩te̩ atef udajikwane̩ e-ajo̩.
U neke gʼe̩do̩la-mi ache e̩wñ du n; alu kʼu nagbo̩, alu le̩ nakajo̩, ajo̩ e-mi la chʼo̩kpakpa, todabu kʼu ma feju e̩wñ ki du mi onugo e̩do̩ n, chai e̩wñ ki dʼe̩ne̩ ki kpe̩ mi wa e̩do̩.
I la che̩wñ kʼomi agbʼo̩la-mi ibenu, mak ibenu-mi le̩ chʼochochi n.
E̩ne̩ omune̩ do̩mo̩ kʼi agba mi ibenu, u la chema ka kʼibenu kʼi agba mi chʼochochi.
Ame̩ fʼuche̩ kpe̩ nyugbo Jo̩n me̩, i la gba ochochi ibenu,
i muda chʼijali e-one̩ omi agba n; ama naka e̩wñ-i todu ku ma ki fʼume̩ jadu.
E̩ne̩ le̩ chʼagege e-ku ma dʼuna tʼo̩ kʼi adʼe̩wñ tejugede; i la dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ jʼef ugane̩-wñ agwoguyo̩ pe̩.
Omi muda chene̩ ibenu ki tʼe-ki Jo̩n gba le̩ le; todu uko̩lo̩ kʼAta du ñwu mi todu kʼu chekpa, uko̩lo̩ le̩ onugo e-kʼu nache agba mi ibenu kakini, Ata kpe̩ mi wa-i.
Oñ Ata ki kpe̩ mi wa le̩, owñ le̩ gba mi ibenu. Me̩ gbʼomuko̩la-wñ mama ta n, me̩ la li alu kʼi de̩ n.
Me̩ la nʼo̩la-wñ ki gugu ef ume̩ n; todu me̩ ke̩do̩nola e̩ne̩ kʼowñ le̩ kpuche̩ wa n.
Me̩ tejane̩ ef O̩takada O̩la O̩jo̩ todabu kʼame̩ do̩ ka ku me̩ ne̩ iñmi ogbegbele̩ ef uwñ; e-le̩ la chʼe-kʼi agba mi ibenu,
i la dʼume̩ e̩do̩ ku me̩ wʼugbo mi ku me̩ anʼiñmi n.
Nagba ojima kwʼugbo one̩ n.
U muda chema ame̩ ka kʼame̩ nʼufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ ef o̩la-me̩ n.
Omi lewa ef odu Ata-mi, me̩ la gba mi n; iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ lewa ef odu e-wñ, me̩ agba e̩ne̩ le̩.
Ame̩ ku me̩ gba ojima kwʼugbo o̩la-me̩, ku me̩ ma tene ojima ki kwugbo O̩jo̩ kate le̩ n, abile ku me̩ neke ake̩do̩no ke?
Me̩ ki do̩ ka kʼomi agwʼajo̩ nʼume̩ ugbo Ata n; e̩ne̩ʼka do̩mo̩ ki agwajo̩ nʼume̩, owñ che Mose̩s, e̩ne̩ ku me̩ kibeno le̩.
Todu iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma ke̩do̩nola Mose̩s, me̩ ma ke̩do̩nola mi ge̩; todu o̩la-mi i ko̩ nyʼo̩takada le̩.
Ama iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma ke̩do̩nola kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ko̩ tef o̩takada n, abile ku me̩ ake̩do̩nola kʼomi aka?
